361440.name: Primal Carnage Soundtrack Collection
361440.description:
Enjoy a Jurassic-sized collection of music with dozens of intense pulse-pounding tracks from Primal Carnage and Primal Carnage: Extinction!

A hybrid fusion of traditional and electronic sounds, the original score was created by maestro composers Gareth Coker & Zach Lemmon (ARK: Survival Evolved, ORI).

Newly updated with optional high resolution versions of the entire collection, which are available in both .WAV and .FLAC formats! This bumper OST features 40 unique pieces of music currently.

Standard quality downloads are presented in MP3 format at 320 Kbps bitrate, whereas the high res versions use lossless compression.

Download location:

Steam / steamapps / music / Primal Carnage Soundtrack Collection
OR
Steam / steamapps / music / Primal Carnage Extinction Soundtrack
361440.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
